articles.title: Aryna Sabalenka overpowers Madison Keys to book Wimbledon semi-final spot - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Tennis News: World number two Aryna Sabalenka stormed into the semi-finals of Wimbledon with a convincing 6-2, 6-4 victory over American Madison Keys in London on
articles.content: Bowlers who have taken hat-tricks in the ODI World Cup

articles.title: BMI is an 'imperfect' way to measure health. But replacing it is complicated - CBC News
articles.description: Last month, the American Medical Association (AMA) formally recognized BMI’s shortcomings and created a new policy advising caution when using it.
articles.content:
Vishal Gentle isn't the avid gym-goer he was before his daughter was born a few months ago.
But the new dad said he does what he can to stay active carrying the baby up and down stairs to get a bit … [+6655 chars]
